00021 using Gtk;
00022 
00023 using System;
00024 using System.IO;
00025 
00026 using Niry;
00027 using Niry.Utils;
00028 using Niry.Network;
00029 using Niry.GUI.Gtk2;
00030 
00031 using NyFolder;
00032 using NyFolder.GUI;
00033 using NyFolder.Utils;
00034 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00035 using NyFolder.GUI.Base;
00036 using NyFolder.PluginLib;
00037 
00038 namespace NyFolder.Plugins.Talk {
00040     public class Talk : Plugin {
00041         // ============================================
00042         // PUBLIC Events
00043         // ============================================
00044 
00045         // ============================================
00046         // PRIVATE Members
00047         // ============================================
00048         private INyFolder nyFolder = null;
00049 
00050         // ============================================
00051         // PUBLIC Constructors
00052         // ============================================
00054         public Talk() {
00055             // Initialize Plugin Info
00056             this.pluginInfo = new Info();
00057 
00058             // Initialize Talk Stock
00059             Gdk.Pixbuf pixbuf;
00060             pixbuf = new Gdk.Pixbuf(null, "TalkBubble.png");
00061             StockIcons.AddToStock("TalkBubble", pixbuf);
00062             StockIcons.AddToStockImages("TalkBubble", pixbuf);
00063         }
00064 
00065         // ============================================
00066         // PUBLIC Methods
00067         // ============================================
00069         public override void Initialize (INyFolder iNyFolder) {
00070             this.nyFolder = iNyFolder;
00071 
00072             // Initialize GUI Events
00073             this.nyFolder.MainWindowStarted += new BlankEventHandler(OnMainWindowStarted);
00074 
00075             // Initialize Protocol Events
00076             CmdManager.AddProtocolEvent += new SetProtocolEventHandler(OnAddProtocolCmds);
00077             CmdManager.DelProtocolEvent += new SetProtocolEventHandler(OnDelProtocolCmds);
00078         }
00079 
00080 
00082         public override void Uninitialize() {
00083         }
00084 
00085         // ============================================
00086         // PRIVATE (Methods) Event Handlers
00087         // ============================================
00088         private void OnMainWindowStarted (object sender) {
00089             // Initialize Talk Component
00090             InitializeTalkMenu();
00091             SetSensitiveTalkMenu(P2PManager.IsListening());
00092 
00093             // Initialize Talk Menu (Network Viewer Right Click Popup)
00094             NetworkViewer nv = nyFolder.MainWindow.NotebookViewer.NetworkViewer as NetworkViewer;
00095             nv.RightMenu += new RightMenuHandler(OnInsertNetworkRightMenu);
00096         }
00097 
00098         private void OnAddProtocolCmds (P2PManager p2pManager) {
00099             // Initalize Talk Manager
00100             TalkManager.Initialize(this.nyFolder);
00101 
00102             // Add Protocol Event Handler
00103             CmdManager.UnknownEvent += new ProtocolHandler(OnUnknownEvent);
00104 
00105             // Sensitivize Talk Menu
00106             SetSensitiveTalkMenu(true);
00107         }
00108 
00109         private void OnDelProtocolCmds (P2PManager p2pManager) {
00110             if (nyFolder.MainWindow != null) {
00111                 // Sensitivize Talk Menu
00112                 SetSensitiveTalkMenu(false);
00113             }
00114 
00115             // Del Protocol Event Handler
00116             CmdManager.UnknownEvent -= new ProtocolHandler(OnUnknownEvent);
00117 
00118             // Uninitalize Talk Manager
00119             TalkManager.Uninitialize();
00120         }
00121 
00122         private void OnUnknownEvent (PeerSocket peer, XmlRequest xml) {
00123             if (xml.FirstTag != "msg") return;
00124 
00125             Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00126                 UserInfo userInfo = peer.Info as UserInfo;
00127                 string type = (string) xml.Attributes["type"];
00128                 if (type == null) {
00129                     TalkManager.InsertMessage(userInfo, xml.BodyText);
00130                 } else if (type == "status") {
00131                     TalkManager.InsertStatus(userInfo, xml.BodyText);
00132                 } else if (type == "error") {
00133                     TalkManager.InsertError(userInfo, xml.BodyText);
00134                 }
00135             });
00136         }
00137 
00138         private void OnTalkWith (object sender, EventArgs args) {
00139             TalkWithDialog dialog = new TalkWithDialog();
00140             if (dialog.Run() == ResponseType.Ok) {
00141                 NetworkViewer nv = nyFolder.MainWindow.NotebookViewer.NetworkViewer;
00142 
00143                 // Open Talk Frame
00144                 UserInfo userInfo = nv.GetUserInfo(dialog.GetPeerSelected());
00145                 TalkManager.AddTalkFrame(userInfo);
00146             }
00147             dialog.Destroy();
00148         }
00149 
00150         private void OnTalkRightMenu (object sender, EventArgs args) {
00151             ExtMenuItem menuItem = sender as ExtMenuItem;
00152             UserInfo userInfo = menuItem.ExtraData as UserInfo;
00153 
00154             // Open Talk Frame
00155             TalkManager.AddTalkFrame(userInfo);
00156         }
00157 
00158         // ============================================
00159         // PRIVATE Methods
00160         // ============================================
00161         private void InitializeTalkMenu() {
00162             ActionEntry[] entries = new ActionEntry[] {
00163                 new ActionEntry("TalkMenu", null, "_Talk", null, null, null),
00164 
00165                 new ActionEntry("Talk", "TalkBubble", "Talk", null, 
00166                                 "Start Talk With...", new EventHandler(OnTalkWith)),
00167             };
00168 
00169             string ui = "<ui>" +
00170                         "  <menubar name='MenuBar'>" +
00171                         "    <menu action='ToolMenu'>" +
00172                         "      <menuitem action='Talk' />" +
00173                         "    </menu>" +
00174                         "  </menubar>" +
00175                         "</ui>";
00176 
00177             nyFolder.MainWindow.Menu.AddMenus(ui, entries);
00178         }
00179 
00180         private void OnInsertNetworkRightMenu (object sender, PopupMenu menu) {
00181             NetworkViewer networkViewer = sender as NetworkViewer;
00182 
00183             foreach (TreePath treePath in networkViewer.SelectedItems) {
00184                 UserInfo userInfo = networkViewer.Store.GetUserInfo(treePath);
00185                 if (userInfo.IsOnline == false) continue;
00186                 ExtMenuItem menuItem = new ExtMenuItem("Talk", "TalkBubble", userInfo);
00187                 menu.AddItem(menuItem, new EventHandler(OnTalkRightMenu));
00188             }
00189         }
00190 
00191         private void SetSensitiveTalkMenu (bool sensitive) {
00192             nyFolder.MainWindow.Menu.SetSensitive("/MenuBar/ToolMenu/Talk", sensitive);
00193         }
00194 
00195         // ============================================
00196         // PUBLIC Properties
00197         // ============================================
00198     }
00199 }
